fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Play a prank on two non-Mafia players tonight. The first target's action tonight will be negated. If they were visiting someone, they will instead use all of the second target's abilities on whoever they were visiting.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can't kill anyone with your ability. Anyone that would die due to your ability is roleblocked instead.
- Roleblock Immunity
